text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with chimichurri sauce that's right
this green sauce is going to be your new
favorite condiment so here we go I'm
going to give you all the ingredients on
the site of course but you're going to
need some fresh garlic a few spices and
an assortment of fresh herbs I have
Italian parsley cilantro and oregano all
right so we're going to peel and roughly
chop the garlic set that aside and then
I'm going to do what's called shave the
parsley by holding the knife at a 45
degree angle you can just shave the
leaves right off the stem Italian
parsley stems have the same flavor as
the leaves and they're very tender so if
you want to spend time and pick out the
big stems go ahead but really not
necessary by the way I'm assisted today
by the lovely and talented Michelle my
wife all right into a blender we're
going to add our oil our chopped garlic
some vinegar now I use white wine
vinegar a lot of people use red I like
the white some salt some cumin some red
pepper flakes some black pepper then our
fresh cilantro oregano and shaved
parsley and don't worry all the
ingredients are on food wishes as usual
all right make sure you have a long
spatula that's going to be very useful
very soon now here's where you need a
little patience we're going to pulse
this on and off in a blender it's going
to take a while to puree don't be
tempted to add extra liquids in here in
oil and vinegar and mess up the perfect
proportions just pulse on and off a
couple times scrape it down push it down
mix it up pulse it a couple times scrape
it down mix it up so after about 12
times scraping and pulsing it eventually
will turn into this a beautiful green
smooth paste incredibly incredibly
flavorful and of course you're going to
be the judge of that and you're going to
adjust the seasoning salt vinegar etc
for your liking and that's it I mean
look at that this is one of those
magical sauces that is equally delicious
on vegetables fish poultry meat and just
bread so there's very few sauces that
can say that they're just great with
everything they always an example you
know ketchup of
so what we did after the chimichurri was
ready grilled up some asparagus some
wild Pacific salmon and after that stuff
was cooked i slathered on that
unbelievable chimichurri sauce which is
just magnificent you have to try this
incredible if you like pesto if you like
salsa verde give this a try and by the
way one word of warning this is not the
best first date sauce to choose because
the parsley gets stuck in your teeth
whom should I tell her I better not yeah
actually I better you know I'm saying so
except for first dates this is perfect
for every occasion by the way make sure
you read the blog post very fascinating
story how this sauce from Argentina
got its name from an Irishman true story
I think anyway I really hope you give
this a try go check out the site to get
all the ingredients and as always enjoy
